parameters.name: hilightcolor
parameters.description: Color to use to indicate stimulus.  See PEBL manual appendix for hundreds of options

parameters.name: numtrials
parameters.description: Number of trials per block (up to five blocks)

parameters.name: keylabels
parameters.description: labels for the ten key boxes

parameters.name: givefeedback
parameters.description: Whether correct/incorrect feedback will be given

parameters.name: round5
parameters.description: Round 5 response options. blank will be ignored

parameters.name: round6
parameters.description: Round 6 response options. blank will be ignored

parameters.name: round7
parameters.description: Round 7 response options. blank will be ignored

parameters.name: round8
parameters.description: Round 8 response options. blank will be ignored
